title: SLA Reporting - Patch Compliance
description: An account manager needs to generate a report for a client demonstrating patch compliance for all their managed servers.

tasks.description: Use the RMM tool to generate a patch compliance report for all the client's servers.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated showing which patches are installed or missing on each server.

tasks.description: Analyze the report to calculate the overall compliance percentage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that 98% of all applicable patches are installed.

tasks.description: Provide the report to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives the compliance report.
